changelog.title: Cyber Arts Bootcamp
changelog.description: 5-day intensive cybersecurity training module covering Foundations, Networking, Cryptography, Blue Team, and Red Team operations.

changelog.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
changelog.description: Day-by-day training with mission briefings, objectives tracking, terminal commands, case studies, and XP rewards.

changelog.title: Progress Tracking
changelog.description: Complete checkpoints to earn 100 XP per day (500 total). Progress saved automatically.
